snippet.title: Tower Tag Home - Early Access Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Add us now to your wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1187330/Tower_Tag/

Up until now, Tower Tag has been an exclusive title for VR arcades, enjoying global success in over 40 countries across North America, Asia, Europe, Australia, Africa and the Middle East. On May 28th 2020, the game will release on Steam and Viveport and bring its fast-paced action to players’ homes around the globe. 

Credits: Camera & direction by Willi Rätzsch (filmk - https://www.filmk.de) & Jean-Pierre Weingart. Edit by Emanuel Kohn. Musik by Dorian Behner & Paul Timmich
